Text:
This is not a great recording, it drops out on one side from time to time. (As the description mentions, it was recorded off of FM radio.) Also, the tracks aren't labeled at all so you'll have to go off the track listing in the description on this page.

However, the music is pretty great so I'd recommend downloading it anyway, as it's the only sample of Chastain I've seen on TPB. Check out tracks 7, 10 and 12 in particular.
